name: What is the refund policy?
content: Refunds are available within 30 days of purchase with proof of receipt.

name: How can I reset my password?
content: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' at the login page and follow the instructions.

name: What payment methods are accepted?
content: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

name: How do I track my order?
content: You can track your order through the 'Order History' section of your account.

name: Is there a warranty on products?
content: Yes, all products come with a 12-month warranty.

name: Can I change my shipping address?
content: Yes, you can change your shipping address before the order is dispatched.

name: Do you offer international shipping?
content: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide.

name: How do I contact customer support?
content: You can contact our support team via email or the live chat feature on our website.

name: What is the delivery time?
content: Delivery times vary by location but typically range from 3-7 business days.

name: Are the products environmentally friendly?
content: Yes, we prioritize sustainability and use eco-friendly materials whenever possible.

name: Can I cancel my subscription?
content: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

name: How do I apply a discount code?
content: Enter your discount code at checkout in the 'Promo Code' field.
